data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Generally, any closed ring structure works. A ____ can ____ made ____ bending ____ into ____ with a handle, where ____ should ____ thick ____ so ____ ring ____ stiff. It can be improved by wrapping thread or bandages around the wire so the soap water can stick better to the ring.
data.partBlankContent: Generally, any closed ring structure works. A blo___ can b_ made b_ bending wi__ into lo__ with a handle, where wi__ should b_ thick eno___ so t__ ring rem____ stiff. It can be improved by wrapping thread or bandages around the wire so the soap water can stick better to the ring.
data.answer: 一般来说，任何闭环结构都可以。鼓风机可以通过将金属丝弯曲成带手柄的环，其中金属丝应该足够粗，以保持环的硬度。在金属丝上缠上一根线或绷带，这样肥皂水就能更好地粘在金属环上。
